alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 5:16AM MST until January 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations today of 1 to 3 inches, with the highest amounts over the southeastern corner of Jackson county and lower amounts over the the northwestern part of the county. * WHERE...Jackson County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
